description.value:
This glass sphere is filled with a swirling purple gas and exudes a faint floral fragrance.

Activate—Shake it Out 1 (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You shake the sphere, causing the gas inside to seep through the glass and coil around you, obscuring your motions. You become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Concealed] against ranged attacks for 3 rounds. In addition, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks to [[/act hide]] for the duration. This gas can be dispersed by strong wind, ending the effects early.

Activate—Yeet it Out 1 (manipulate)

Effect You throw the sphere, granting one creature within 60 feet the benefits of Shake it Out for 1 minute. This causes the orb to shatter, gaining the consumable trait.

publication.title: Starfinder Society Scenario #1-06: Magic in the Mist
